prob.hw2 <- function(n,r)
 {
   y <- prod(1:n)
   x <- prod(1:(n-r))
   z <- prod(1:r)
   print(y/(x*z))
 }
 
 prob.hw2(5,3)
 
 prob.hw2(7,2)
 
 prob.hw2(0,0) #note we get the expected output since this case is undefined.
 
 prob.hw2(100,5)
 
 prob.hw2(-100,5) #note we get the expect output when we put in a negative number
